steps.text:
By using the IPP (Internet Printing Protocol), you can ❷ ❸ ❶ ❶ ❶ ❷ send printing jobs to CNS printers from your PC. First, open a web browser and go to the URL: ⇒https://itcsecure.sfc.keio.ac.jp/form/password

Type your CNS login name in ❶ 'CNS login name' and your CNS login password in ❷ 'CNS login password.' Then, click ❸ 'Login.'
Click ❶ 'IPP Password.'
Click ❶ 'Confirm.' Remember  the  password  you  will  see  in  the  next  page. This password will be used in STEP 15.

Open a web browser and go to the URL: ⇒https://www.sfc.itc.keio.ac.jp/en/top_sfc.html

Click ❷ 'Printer Information' from the ❶ 'Computer' menu.
Click ❶ 'Printing procedure.'
Scroll  down  to  the  middle  part  of  the  page  and  click  ❶ 'Printer driver.'

Download the appropriate driver for your operating system and desired printer. For black-and-white documents, choose ❶ 'Monochrome Printer.' For color documents, choose ❷ 'Color Printer.'

The following procedure will be for the black-and-white printer (monoprn), but if you would like to use the color printer (colorprn) as well, set the monoprn printer first, then follow STEP 07~22 again with ❷ 'Color Printer.'

Please refer to 【p.150 : How to Check a PC's Operating System】 in case you do not know your PC’s operating system.

subpages.title: Adding the Printer to your PC

steps.text: Open  the  installer  you  just  downloaded.  The  window shown on the left will appear. Then, click ❶ 'Browse....'
Select ❶ 'Desktop' and click ❷ 'OK.'
Click ❶ 'Extract.'
After  installation,  open  'Control  Panel'  from  'All  Apps.' ❶ ❶ Then, click ❶ 'Hardware and Sound.'
Click ❶ 'Add a device.'
Click ❶ 'The printer that I want isn’t listed.'

Confirm ❶ 'Select a shared printer by name' is selected and type one of the printer addresses below in ❷ . Then, click ❸ 'Next.'
Black and White Printer (Monochrome):
⇒https://cnsipp.sfc.keio.ac.jp/monoprn
Color Printer:
⇒https://cnsipp.sfc.keio.ac.jp/colorprn
Type  your  CNS  login  name  in ❶ 'User  Name'  and  your CNS  IPP  password  from  STEP  03  in ❷ 'Password.'  Then, click ❸ 'OK.'
After the connection is established, 'Add Printer Wizard' will appear. Click ❶ 'Have Disk....'
Click ❶ 'Browse....'
Open  'disk1'  from  the  folder  in  which  you  extracted printer  drivers  during  installation  in  STEP  10.  Select  the ❶ file in that folder and click ❷ 'Open.'
Click ❶ 'OK.'

If you chose 'Monochrome Printer,' select ❶ 'RICOH RPCS Basic BW.'
If you chose 'Color Printer', select 'RICOH IPSiO SP C841 RPCS.'
Then, click ❷ 'OK' to proceed.
Click ❶ 'Next.'

Click ❶ 'Print a test page.' Check that the job has been sent successfully by using the terminal next to one of the CNS printers. Confirm that your test page has printed correctly. Then, click ❷ 'Finish.'

Printing from Your PC (Windows 10) is completed.
